metadata.title: CVE-2024-26878 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  quota: Fix potential NULL pointer dereference  Below race may cause NULL pointer dereference  P1					P2 dquot_free_inode			quota_off 					  drop_dquot_ref 					   remove_dquot_ref 					   dquots = i_dquot(inode)   dquots = i_dquot(inode)   srcu_read_lock   dquots[cnt]) != NULL (1) 					     dquots[type] = NULL (2)   spin_lock(&dquots[cnt]->dq_dqb_lock) (3)    ....  If dquot_free_inode(or other routines) checks inode's quota pointers (1) before quota_off sets it to NULL(2) and use it (3) after that, NULL pointer dereference will be triggered.  So let's fix it by using a temporary pointer to avoid this issue.
